cast.overview: When the boss' unlucky daughter is missing in South America, Campana is sent to watch the boss' most unlucky employee who is sent as a private detective in hopes he can duplicate the daughter's mistakes.
cast.title: La Chèvre

details.biography: Rodrigo Puebla was born in San Diego de La Union, Guanajuato, Mexico, on March 13, 1929, and grew up in a modest environment. His life was marked by perseverance and sacrifice to achieve his dream of becoming an actor. Before becoming an actor, he worked in various occupations to support his family. Puebla was a recognized actor in the theatrical and television world in Latin America. His legacy as an actor continues to be remembered and appreciated for his talent and dedication to his career. He passed away on January 15, 1993 in Mexico City, Mexico.
details.name: Rodrigo Puebla
details.place_of_birth: San Diego de La Union, Guanajuato, Mexico
